authors.name: Joe Ivans
authors.bio: Joe is a software engineer with experience in enterprise development. He is passionate about architecture and high-level enterprise design. Joe previously served as an OIF Marine.

authors.name: Marquesa Asmussen
authors.bio: Marquesa is a Seattle-based software developer. She comes from a diverse background with experience in sales, construction, the food and beverage industry and the performing arts. She is a passionate communicator who strives to make connections and build a sense of community, uplifting and encouraging her peers to grow themselves. Marquesa is driven to give her clients the best possible development experience and finished product.

authors.name: Stefanie Riehle
authors.bio: Stefanie is a Seattle transplant who still can't believe she gets to live here, even after nearly 10 years. In a former life she was an HR professional, but now brings ideas to life through programming. In her free time, she enjoys the arts, a good craft beer or whiskey, and hanging out with her amazing daughter, her friends, and her many, many houseplants.

authors.name: Kason Braley
authors.bio: Kason is a Navy veteran with a passion for streamlined solutions to everyday problems. His hobbies include spending time with his fianc√©e and two dogs, playing chess, and playing ice hockey.
